content.data: Create a Flip Up Window Seat

Start a  new  Job using the Construction Method, Material, and Door you want to use for the Window Seat unit. 
 
 
 Place a Base Cabinet on a Wall - size it to the size you want to use for the Window Seat. 
 
 
 Double click on the Cabinet to go to the Assembly Level. 
 
 
 Go to the Section Editor. 
 
 
 Go to  Modifications | Default Assembly . 
 
 
 Go to the End Ortho (Side Smiley Face) view, click on the Edit Shape button in the sidebar.
Start a  new  Job using the Construction Method, Material, and Door you want to use for the Window Seat unit.

Go to the End Ortho (Side Smiley Face) view, click on the Edit Shape button in the sidebar.

Select the top edge and in the sidebar select Face as the Side Type.

Select the top edge and note it is now viewable in the Sectioning screen so you may set Doors to this face and hinge it correctly.
